title: Beautiful Fairmount 3 bed / 3 bath apt w/ parking - 2 years old!
description:
This Beautiful and spacious first floor new construction 3 bed/3 bath condo is located in the heart of Fairmount and comes with PARKING. Walk in to find an open lay out living/dining area with floor to ceiling sliding glass doors for natural lighting leading into the backyard for outdoor space and city views. The kitchen features high end finishes to include a stunning waterfall sit-in island with quartz counter tops, beautiful stainless steel appliances and unique back-splash and light fixtures. On the first floor you will also find a coat closet, a large bedroom with over-sized windows and a full bathroom with high end fixtures. On the lower level you will find a laundry room and two large bedrooms with high ceilings and floor to ceiling sliding glass doors for maximum sunlight, large walk in closet and private full bathrooms with designer selected tiles and finishes. Location is hard to beat, walking distance to the museums, Parks, trails, and tons of hot restaurants, pubs, and shops. An amazing place to live in the center of it all! Approximately 1600 sq. ft.
Available as of September 1, 2022. 10 month and 22 month lease options. First month rent, last month rent and security deposit ($3500) required at lease signing.

title: Spacious 5 Bedroom in Fishtown/East Kensington
description:
5 bedroom, 3 bath, 2,400 square foot beautiful restored home available in Fishtown/East Kensington. This home is very spacious with high ceilings, large windows, new kitchen, high efficiency heater (Bosch) tons of storage and wood floors throughout the entire house.
The first floor has a living room, dining room, new kitchen, bathroom with tub, shower and washer/dryer. The back door leads to a big backyard with plenty of room for grilling, fire pit, a garden, etc. In the kitchen there is a back staircase that leads to a master bedroom with a new bathroom. The second floor has an additional 2 bedrooms and bathroom with claw foot tub. The third floor has 2 more bedrooms. Each bedroom in the house is spacious with good light and ample storage. Basement is enormous with high ceilings and great for creative space, gym space or storage.
This home is a couple blocks away from the York/Dauphin train stop and walking distance from all of the great coffee shops/restaurants/etc in Fishtown and East Kensington.
First month, last month and security deposit required. Available 9/1/2022 - sooner may be possible as well. Pets negotiable. Owner is a licensed Realtor.

title: Large One Bedroom , Elevator Building, Beautiful Court Yards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
-Garage and parking lot available
-Listed on the National Historic Register
-Elevator building
-24/7 emergency maintenance service
-New fitness center
-Smoke-free apartments available
-Seasonal Bike Share Program
-Modernista Apartment kitchens with stainless steel appliances available
-On site washer and dryer
-Beautiful courtyards
-Professional on-site management team
-Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge

title: Experience Fitler Sq! Incredible 3 bed 2 ba home with amenities galore
description:
515 S. 27th Street
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. title: Brand NEW Corner Townhouse for rent near Martha Bar! Roof Deck/yard!
description:
Welcome to 2514 Coral Street! Be the first person to live in this custom built, brand new, sunny corner townhome with 3 bedrooms, 2 den, 2.5 bath, roof deck, large basement and rear yard located only a few blocks off Frankford Ave in the hot East Kensington neighborhood. You'll be only a few minute walk from popular destinations: Kensington Community Grocery Co-Op, Martha Bar, Philadelphia Brewing Company, Franny Lou's Porch, Hello Donuts and don't forget the BRAND newly renovated Pops Skatepark/Playground and Hagert Square Playground... I could go on! Enter the home into a thoughtfully designed vestibule area with built in seating/storage (great for a stroller or a bike!). The first floor offers a unique split layout with a 2 designated living spaces, a powder room, and a spacious kitchen with black matte cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, open wood shelving, and durable quartz countertops and leads to an adorable/private fenced rear yard (great for grilling!)...if you continue in the other direction off the kitchen, you'll find a staircase to a spacious basement (with the tallest ceilings you've ever seen!)...On the 2nd floor of the home you will find two equally sized/spacious bedrooms with great built-in closets, a full hallway bathroom (with an oversized tub), a designated laundry room with a full-sized, side-by-side GE washer and dryer set, as well as a large open den area with a huge window that would be great for an office, library or play area for kids! Continue up to the 3rd floor to find your full-floor Primary Suite. The spacious bedroom features a walk-through custom closet that leads to your spa-like bathroom outfitted with a gorgeous free-standing soaking tub, double vanity, and frameless glass enclosed shower. Before you reach the stairs that lead to your private roofdeck there is ANOTHER den (great for an office, peloton room or even a small nursery!). The house is outfitted with a 2-zone HVAC system for maximum efficiency.
We are currently still under construction, but able to schedule private tours by appointment at your convenience.
The house will be ready for occupancy by 7/15 and is privately managed by ME! the landlord/owner of the home. No need to deal with the headache of large property management companies you can't get a hold of! Schedule your tour today!
